name: .PP5 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PP5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image file created by Corel Picture Publisher version 5, an image editing program previously owned by Micrografx; stores an image in a proprietary format; can be created and edited with Picture Publisher's text, drawing, and painting tools.

content: NOTE: Different versions of Picture Publisher use different file extensions. Version 4 uses the .PP4 extension, and versions 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 use the .PPF extension. All file types are still supported by the CorelDRAW Graphics Suite software package.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
